subject: VAM Pro mounting
description_text:
Hello Simsonn,

I have received my plus x and VAM pro set and thare is a problem mounting
them.

The Vam pro have lineair movement and they have to mount on the brake and
throttle padal in a 90° angle like the clutch mount bracket alse the
vibrations move to the pedalplate,you dont veel them and it's make noise.

Iv'e mounted the brake with the clutch bracket and it's feels very good.
The normal bracket on the trottle is terrible.

I advise to change it to avoid bad experiences with the VAM Pro.

Can Simsonn supply the (clutch) 90° angle bracket to me?

Kind Regards,

Alex lampen
Vogelgaarde 38
3235SJ Rockanje
The Netherlands

conversations.body_text: Hi A Lampen,    We had previously considered the installation of the clutch, but admittedly, it doesn't look very elegant and there's a chance the motor might be stepped on by mistake. If the vibration feels too strong during use, feel free to adjust the vibration frequency and intensity for a more comfortable experience.  I’ll contact our sales team to send you a clutch mounting bracket as soon as possible. Thank you very much for your support of our products!

Hi Simsonn i bent one mount and it is to my liking now,the feedback is much
better and more quiet this way.
I don't need a new clutch bracket now anymore.


Thanks for the quick response support.


Op do 26 jun 2025, 11:09 schreef service@simsonn.com
Hi A Lampen,    Okay, thanks for the timely counter, have fun!
